en: She felt sick and sank to the ground.
zh: 她觉得不舒服，然后就倒在地上了。

en: She looks bad-tempered, but she is kind at heart.
zh: 她看起来脾气不好，但心地善良。

en: It is difficult for us to get along with her, because she is hard to please.
zh: 我们很难和她相处，因为她很难取悦。

en: She almost passed out.
She is a girl full of sentiment.
zh: 她是个多愁善感的女孩。

en: She pulled herself together and started to talk again.
zh: 她振作起来，又开始说话了。

en: She fell down senseless on the floor.
zh: 她不省人事地倒在地板上。

en: She fainted but came to in about 5 minutes.
zh: 她晕倒了，但大约5分钟后醒了过来。

en: She fainted but came to after a few minutes.
zh: 她晕倒了，但几分钟后醒了过来。

en: She fainted, but came to after a few minutes.
zh: 她晕倒了，但几分钟后醒了过来。

en: She was in a sad state.
She struck me as a tactful girl.
zh: 我觉得她是个很懂分寸的女孩。

en: She passed right by me without noticing.
zh: 她从我身边走过，都没注意到我。

en: She has a friendly appearance.
It appears that she might change her mind.
zh: 看来她可能会改变主意。

en: A quick temper is the only defect in her character.
zh: 脾气暴躁是她性格上唯一的缺点。

en: She is aggressive.
She's assertive.
She's strong-willed.
She was robbed of her money on her way home.
zh: 她在回家的路上被抢了钱。

en: She went home.
She scolded her daughter for coming home too late.
zh: 她责骂女儿回家太晚了。

en: She could not find her way back.
She showed a great deal of wit in handling the delicate question.
zh: 她在处理这个棘手的问题时表现出了极大的机智。

en: She was in a bad mood; she must have been put off by something that had happened before I arrived.
zh: 她心情不好；她肯定是被我来之前发生的事情惹恼了。

en: She is in a temper, because she missed her usual train in the subway and had to walk to work.
zh: 她正在生气，因为她错过了平时搭乘的地铁，不得不步行上班。

en: She is in a bad mood.
She took full advantage of the opportunity.
zh: 她充分利用了这个机会。

en: She earned remarkable grades at the final exams.
zh: 她在期末考试中取得了优异的成绩。

en: She's working on a term paper.
Expectation caused her to be flushed with excitement.
zh: 期望让她兴奋得满面通红。

en: She knew the story already.
zh: 她已经知道这个故事了。

en: It seemed that she had already received the money.
She removed the papers from the desk.
zh: 她把文件从桌子上拿走了。

en: She found her purse under the desk.
zh: 她在桌子底下找到了她的钱包。

en: She looks unhappy.
She doesn't seem happy.
She dreamed a strange dream.
She had a strange hat on.
zh: 她戴着一顶奇怪的帽子。

en: She came out with some strange tunings.
zh: 她演奏出一些奇怪的曲调。

en: She was all smiles.
She gladly accepted his proposal.
zh: 她欣然接受了他的求婚。

en: She danced with joy.
She was only too glad to help us.
She is willing to do anything for me.
One moment she was happy, the next she was sad.
zh: 一会儿她很高兴，一会儿她又很伤心。

en: She fairly jumped for joy.
zh: 她简直高兴得跳了起来。

en: She was full of joy.
Her heart was filled with joy.
She is beside herself with joy.
She showed her courage in the face of danger.
zh: 她临危不惧，展现出了勇气。

en: She may not be aware of the danger.
zh: 她可能没有意识到危险。

en: She thought no harm.
She provided for an urgency.
zh: 她为紧急情况做了准备。

en: She almost drowned.
She came near to drowning.
She came close to drowning.
He came near being run over by a car.
She came very near being run over by a motorcar.
She came very near to being run over by a car.
She was almost hit by a car.
She was within an ace of saying "I don't know".
zh: 她差一点就说“我不知道”了。

en: She takes after her mother in looks.
She looks pale. She may have been Ill.
zh: 她脸色苍白，可能生病了。

en: A blush came over her face.
She continued sobbing without looking up.
She turned away and began to cry.
She resembles her mother in face.
She persists in her belief.
She glared at me with angry eyes.
She has a round face.
She looks indifferent but deep down she's very pleased.
zh: 她表面上看起来漠不关心，但内心非常高兴。

en: She talked about the people and things that interested her.
zh: 她谈论着她感兴趣的人和事。

en: She didn't seem interested.
She put salt into her coffee by mistake.
zh: 她不小心把盐放进了咖啡里。

en: She is wrong.
She is in the wrong.
She dialed the wrong number.
She acknowledged having made a mistake.
She was unconscious of her mistake.
zh: 她没有意识到自己的错误。

en: She will get over the shock soon.
zh: 她很快就会从震惊中恢复过来。

en: Can she come in time?
She's a good photographer because she's so observant.
zh: 她是一位优秀的摄影师，因为她非常善于观察。

en: She passed the examination with ease.
She finished the job with ease.
She did the job with ease.
She wore a simple dress.
zh: 她穿了一件朴素的连衣裙。

en: She is qualified as a nurse.
She was impressed with the altruistic service of nurses.
zh: 她对护士的利他服务印象深刻。

en: She said she was nurse, which was a lie.
zh: 她说她是护士，但那是谎言。

en: She became a nurse.
She is a nurse.
She is not a nurse, but a doctor.
She may be a nurse. I am not sure.
zh: 她可能是一名护士。 我不确定。

en: She tasted the cake to see if it was sweet enough.
zh: 她尝了尝蛋糕，看看是否够甜。

en: She wears a sweet perfume.
You could say she has a sweet tooth.
zh: 你可以说她很喜欢吃甜食。

en: She is partial to sweets.
She loves sweets.
She was moved to tears.
She couldn't suppress her emotions.
zh: 她无法抑制自己的情绪。

en: Her emotion was too strong for words.
zh: 她的情绪强烈到无法用语言表达。

en: She made that offer by way of thanks.
zh: 她提出那个提议是为了表示感谢。

en: Her voice broke with emotion.
zh: 她的声音因激动而哽咽。

en: She wept with emotion.
Her mind is broad enough to listen to his son.
zh: 她心胸宽广，愿意倾听她儿子的话。

en: She was wearing a thick coat against the chill.
zh: 她穿着厚厚的外套来抵御寒冷。

en: She was wearing a heavy coat to protect against the chill.
zh: 她穿着厚重的外套来抵御寒冷。

en: She shuddered with cold.
She was shivering with cold.
Because she was cold, she turned on the stove.
zh: 因为她冷，所以她打开了炉子。

en: She's leading a happy life with her husband near the sea in Kamakura.
zh: 她在镰仓海边和丈夫过着幸福的生活。

en: She had her bag snatched.
She reached for the bag.
She is a fluent speaker of English.
She gathered the pieces of the broken dish.
zh: 她收拾起破碎盘子的碎片。

en: She wrinkled her brows.
She did the work without any difficulty.
zh: 她毫不费力地完成了这项工作。

en: She performed this trick with ease.
zh: 她轻松地完成了这个魔术。

en: She sang happily.
She dreamed a pleasant dream.
She had a pleasant dream.
She has a love of learning.
She has a delightful sense of humor.
She is apprehensive of failure in the finals.
zh: 她担心期末考试会失败。

en: She looked back on her school days.
zh: 她回首往昔的校园生活。

en: She earns money by taking in students.
She boards students.
She is very popular among the students.
She pretended to be a student.
She rents a room to a student.
zh: 她把一个房间租给了一个学生。

en: She grounded her students thoroughly in English grammar.
zh: 她让学生彻底掌握了英语语法的基础。

en: She instructs students in English.
She teaches students English.
She is a student.
She fell fast asleep over a study aid.
zh: 她趴在学习资料上睡着了。

en: She is highly reputed not only as a scholar but also as a poet.
zh: 她不仅作为学者享有盛誉，而且作为诗人也备受赞誉。

en: She is a scholar and poet.
She put on high airs with her learning, and she was not popular.
zh: 她摆出一副学识渊博的架子，所以不受欢迎。

en: She talked about her school life.
zh: 她谈论了她的学校生活。

en: She showed me a picture of her mother as a schoolgirl.
zh: 她给我看了一张她母亲当学生时的照片。

en: She dropped out of school.
She was on her way to school.
She dislikes going to school.
She is an honor to our school.
She cannot have done well at school.
zh: 她在学校的表现不可能很好。

en: It seems that she lives in the neighborhood of the school.
She lives within a stone's throw of the school.
zh: 她住在离学校很近的地方。

en: She goes to school.
She bought a bicycle in order to go to school.
zh: 她为了上学买了一辆自行车。

en: She was late to school.
She tends to be late for school.
She recollected the first day when she went to school.
zh: 她回忆起她上学的第一天。

en: She remembered the first day she went to school.
zh: 她记得她上学的第一天。

en: She is studying fine art at school.
She was noted for her good looks at school.
zh: 她在学校因美貌而出名。

en: She made friends with them at the school festival.
zh: 她在学校的节日上和他们交了朋友。

en: She gave me a bag made of leather.
zh: 她给了我一个皮制的包。

en: She turned to the left at the corner.
She does know it.
She may be cute, but I don't like her.
zh: 她可能很可爱，但我不喜欢她。

en: She was graded up.
She was promoted.
Every time she coughed, she felt a great deal of pain.
zh: 每次她咳嗽，都感到非常疼痛。

en: She's allergic to going out.
She put on her overcoat before going out.
She prefers staying home to going out.
zh: 她宁愿待在家里也不愿出门。

en: She put on her hat to go out.
She was on the point of going out.
She was about to go out.
She went out.
She drives an imported car.
She has no chances of coming in contact with foreigners.
zh: 她没有机会接触外国人。

en: She is married to a foreigner.
She's married to a foreigner.
She was a foreigner and was treated as such.
zh: 她是个外国人，因此也受到了那样的待遇。

en: She is keen to go abroad.
She talked long of her experiences abroad.
zh: 她滔滔不绝地讲述她在国外的经历。

en: She has gone abroad.
She speaks English with a foreign accent.
zh: 她说英语带着外国口音。

en: She had never dreamed of meeting him abroad.
zh: 她从未梦想过会在国外遇见他。

en: She never dreamed she'd meet him overseas.
zh: 她从未梦想过会到海外遇见他。

en: She never dreamed she'd meet him in a foreign country.
zh: 她从未梦想过会在国外遇见他。

en: She was coming down the stairs.
She went down the stairs.
She dashed downstairs.
She went down the stairs in a hurry.
zh: 她匆匆忙忙地走下楼梯。

en: She is fond of painting a picture.
She likes painting pictures.
She is drawing a picture.
She looked at the picture.
She's got a good eye for paintings.
She posed for a drawing.
She has a good hand for painting.
She is liked by everyone.
She is loved by everyone.
She has a cottage by the sea.
She is living abroad.
She spends a lot of money when she goes abroad.
She has been invited to sing in a choir in a foreign country.
zh: 她被邀请去国外的一个合唱团唱歌。

en: She has never gone abroad.
She is anxious to go abroad.
She reaped a rich harvest from her study abroad.
zh: 她从留学中获得了丰硕的成果。

en: She stood looking out toward the sea.
zh: 她站在那里，向海边眺望。

en: She stood looking out to the sea.
zh: 她站在那里，向海边眺望。

en: She grew up near the sea, yet she hates swimming.
zh: 她在海边长大，却讨厌游泳。

en: She indulged herself in nostalgic memories.
zh: 她沉浸在怀旧的回忆中。

en: She is loved by everybody because she is cheerful.
zh: 她因为性格开朗而受大家喜爱。

en: She abandoned herself to pleasure.
She is bright, friendly, kind, and considerate. In brief, she is a good person.
zh: 她开朗、友好、善良、体贴。总之，她是个好人。

en: She willingly acceded to my request.
zh: 她欣然同意了我的请求。

en: She readily listened to my request.
She kindly listened to my request.
zh: 她友善地听取了我的请求。

en: She graciously listened to my request.
zh: 她亲切地听取了我的请求。

en: She is determined to leave the company.
She quit the company.
She'd better bone up on company policy.
zh: 她最好好好复习一下公司政策。

en: She gained a position of responsibility in the firm.
zh: 她在公司获得了一个负责任的职位。

en: She wanted a better job than cleaning office floors.
zh: 她想要一份比打扫办公室地板更好的工作。

en: She investigated the company's output record carefully.
zh: 她仔细调查了公司的生产记录。

en: There was a pink slip waiting for her at the office.
zh: 她在办公室收到了一张解雇通知单。

en: She is known as auntie at the office.
zh: 她在办公室被称为阿姨。

en: She telephoned him that she couldn't attend the meeting.
zh: 她打电话告诉他她不能参加会议。

en: She kept from talking during the meeting.
zh: 她在会议期间一直保持沉默。

en: She decided not to attend the meeting.
She explained that she couldn't attend the meeting.
zh: 她解释说她不能参加会议。

en: She tells her tale of misery to everyone she meets.
zh: 她向遇到的每个人诉说她的苦难经历。

en: She acceded to our demands.
I went there to see her.
She reluctantly agreed to our proposal.
zh: 她不情愿地同意了我们的提议。

en: She likes to talk in our presence.
zh: 她喜欢当着我们的面说话。

en: She lives just across from us.
She didn't come to help, but to hinder us.
zh: 她来不是为了帮助我们，而是为了阻碍我们。

en: She took advantage of our hospitality and stayed a whole month without paying us anything.
zh: 她利用了我们的好客，整整住了一个月，什么也没付给我们。

en: She called out to us for help.
She implied that she would like to come with us.
zh: 她暗示她想和我们一起去。

en: She was always pulling my leg when we worked together.
zh: 我们一起工作的时候，她总是开我的玩笑。

en: She wept over her child's death.
zh: 她为孩子的去世而哭泣。

en: She was worn out from overwork.
zh: 她因过度劳累而疲惫不堪。

en: She worked to excess.
She spoke to the section manager.
She is delicately constituted.
She had her baggage carried to the airport.
zh: 她让人把行李搬到机场。

en: She is dressed like a bride.
She picked flowers.
She likes to arrange flowers.
She arranged the flowers beautifully.
She is watering the flowers.
The flowers cheered her up.
She tried to bring the flowers into focus.
zh: 她试图使鲜花成为焦点。

en: She is very fond of flowers.
She says that she likes flowers.
She was carrying a basket full of flowers.
She spends as much money as she earns.
She warmed herself by the fire.
She has an extremely expressive singing voice.
She became a singer.
She is nothing but a singer.
She is not so much a singer as a comedian.
zh: 与其说她是歌手，不如说她是喜剧演员。

en: She is noted as a singer.
As a singer, she's well known.
zh: 作为一名歌手，她很有名。

en: She's well known as a singer.
zh: 她以歌手的身份而闻名。

en: She is famous as a singer.
zh: 她作为一名歌手而闻名。

en: She made a name for herself as a singer.
Her success as a singer made her famous.
zh: 她作为歌手的成功使她成名。

en: She is booming as a singer.
zh: 她作为一名歌手，事业蒸蒸日上。

en: Is she valued highly as a singer?
zh: 她作为一名歌手，评价很高吗？

en: She was trained as a singer.
She is a poor excuse for a singer.
She is not so much a singer as an actress.
zh: 与其说她是歌手，不如说她是演员。

en: She stopped singing the song.
Is she singing a song or playing the piano?
zh: 她是在唱歌还是在弹钢琴？

en: She began to sing.
She doesn't seem to know what to do with her leisure time.
zh: 她似乎不知道该如何利用她的空闲时间。

en: She gives most of her spare time to playing the piano.
zh: 她把大部分空闲时间都用来弹钢琴。

en: Her free time goes in playing golf.
zh: 她空闲时间都用来打高尔夫球。

en: She devoted her life to the study of science.
zh: 她把一生都献给了科学研究。

en: She is ignorant of even the simplest fact about science.
zh: 她甚至对最简单的科学事实都一无所知。

en: She is ignorant of even the simplest facts about science.
zh: 她甚至对最简单的科学事实都一无所知。

en: She wrote on gender bias in science.
zh: 她写了关于科学领域性别偏见的文章。

en: She is weakest at science.
She is said to be a domestic woman.
She seems to be laboring under the family handicap.
zh: 她似乎正受家庭环境的拖累。

en: She agreed that she would pay half the rent.
zh: 她同意支付一半的租金。

en: She went to New York, leaving her family behind.
zh: 她去了纽约，把家人留在了身后。

en: She likes to cook for her family.
She likes cooking for her family.
She worked on behalf of her family.
zh: 她为了她的家庭而工作。

en: She prepares wholesome meals for her family.
zh: 她为她的家人准备有益健康的饭菜。

en: She worked hard in behalf of her family.
zh: 她为了她的家庭努力工作。

en: She boasts of her family.
She studies hygiene as part of her domestic science course.
zh: 她学习卫生学，这是她家政课程的一部分。

en: Not only does she keep house, but she teaches at school.
zh: 她不仅操持家务，还在学校教书。

en: Not only does she keep house, but she also works as a school teacher.
zh: 她不仅操持家务，还在学校当老师。

en: Not only does she do house work, she is a teacher.
zh: 她不仅做家务，还是个老师。

en: She went about the household chores.
She has a great interest in house keeping.
zh: 她对家政管理有很大的兴趣。

en: She was occupied with household work.
She was busy with household work.
She was busy with housework.
She's at a loss how to make ends meet.
zh: 她不知道该如何维持生计。

en: She has let her house furnished.
She has put her house up for sale.
She was getting ready for leaving home.
She spoke for the homeless.
She apologized to his father for coming home late.
zh: 她为晚回家向她父亲道歉。

en: She thought of her cat left behind at home.
She had an air conditioner installed in her house.
She is happiest when she is at home.
zh: 她在家里的时候最快乐。

en: She's most happy when she's at home.
zh: 她在家里的时候最快乐。

en: I do not think that she is at home.
Is she at home?
She is not home, but at school.
She has lunch at home.
She's at home taking care of the kids.
She doesn't speak Japanese at home.
She has been ill since about summer.
zh: 她大约从夏天开始就生病了。

en: She can hardly wait for the summer vacation.
zh: 她迫不及待地想放暑假。

en: She changed her hairstyle during summer vacation.
zh: 她在暑假期间改变了发型。

en: She doesn't always take a trip to France in summer.
zh: 她并不总是在夏天去法国旅行。

en: She came up with a possible solution.
zh: 她想出了一个可能的解决方案。

en: She greeted Mr Kato with a smile.
zh: 她微笑着向加藤先生问好。

en: She greeted Mr. Kato with a smile.
zh: 她微笑着向加藤先生问好。

en: She saw play after play.
zh: 她看了一场又一场的戏。

en: How many pens does she have?
She has hundreds of books.
She's been cheating on her husband for years.
zh: 她背着她丈夫出轨好几年了。

en: She has been dyeing her hair black for years.
She has suffered his ill treatment of her in silence for years.
zh: 她默默忍受他对她的虐待好几年了。

en: She repeated over and over that she was innocent of the crime.
zh: 她一遍又一遍地重复说她是无辜的。

en: She repeatedly said that she was innocent.
Though she repeated that she was a college student, I could not bring myself to believe it.
zh: 虽然她一再声称自己是大学生，但我还是无法相信。

en: She called me many a time.
zh: 她给我打过很多次电话。

en: She called me many times.
zh: 她给我打过很多次电话。

en: She practiced playing the piano again and again.
zh: 她一遍又一遍地练习弹钢琴。

en: She tried several times but failed.
zh: 她尝试了好几次，但都失败了。

en: She waited for hours and hours.
She listened to music for hours.
zh: 她听了好几个小时的音乐。

en: She waited for him for hours.
She doesn't like to leave anything unfinished.
zh: 她不喜欢留下任何未完成的事情。

en: She is quick at everything.
She is honest in all she does.
She gives the impression of not caring much about anything.
zh: 她给人的印象是不太关心任何事情。

en: How old do you think she is?
She had to use her dictionary many times.
zh: 她不得不多次使用她的字典。

en: What is she worried about?
I wonder what's on her mind.
What does she have?
What is she about?
What's she doing?
What is she so curious about?
She was deliberate in everything she did.
zh: 她做每件事都是故意的。

en: She was at a loss as to what to do.
What do you think she is going to do?
She was at a loss for what to do.
She was at a loss what to do.
She didn't know what to do.
What does she do?
What's eating her?
She likes reading better than anything else.
She denied that she had stolen anything.
She signed to me to say nothing.
She spoke as though nothing had happened.
zh: 她说得好像什么都没发生过一样。

en: She was restless because she did not have anything to do.
zh: 她因为没事做而感到烦躁。

en: She'll sit there for hours without doing anything.
zh: 她会坐在那里几个小时什么也不做。

en: She acted as if she knew nothing.
She drove my car without so much as asking.
zh: 她未经允许就开了我的车。

en: She finds fault with everything and everyone.
zh: 她对一切和每个人都吹毛求疵。

en: She is curious about anything.
What do you think she said?
She's such a lovely girl!
She talks everything over with her parents.
zh: 她什么事都和父母商量。

en: She believes whatever he says.
It seems to me that she knows everything.
She will have her own way.
She must have everything her own way.
zh: 她凡事都要按自己的方式来。

en: She may well be said to think of everything in terms of money.
zh: 人们完全可以说她满脑子都是钱。

en: She thinks of everything in terms of money.
How beautiful she is!
How she talks!
She is acting from some selfish motive.
zh: 她做事是出于某种自私的动机。

en: She asked me if anything was the matter.
zh: 她问我是否出了什么事。

en: She seems to know something important.
zh: 她好像知道一些重要的事情。

en: Does she have a hobby?
She refused to speak of what had happened.
zh: 她拒绝谈论发生过的事情。

en: She acted as if she didn't care what happened.
zh: 她表现得好像她不在乎发生什么事。

en: She resembles her mother in every respect.
zh: 她在各方面都像她的母亲。

en: She quit her job for some reason.
zh: 她因为某种原因辞掉了工作。

en: What is she so unhappy about?
She felt something touch her neck.
zh: 她感觉到有什么东西碰了她的脖子。

en: She wears a lot of makeup.
She is putting on some face lotion.
zh: 她正在涂抹一些润肤露。

en: She was born and brought up on the backstreets.
zh: 她出生并成长在贫民窟。

en: She went to Italy with a view to studying music.
zh: 她去意大利是为了学习音乐。

en: She devoted her time to the study of music.
zh: 她把时间都投入到音乐学习中。

en: She enjoyed herself at the concert.
zh: 她在音乐会上玩得很开心。

en: She did not arrive until the concert was over.
zh: 她直到音乐会结束才到。

en: She married a musician.
She made her first appearance as a musician.
zh: 她首次以音乐家的身份亮相。

en: She went to Germany for the purpose of studying music.
zh: 她去德国是为了学习音乐。

en: She went to France in order to study music.
zh: 她去法国是为了学习音乐。

en: She went to Italy to study music.
zh: 她去意大利是为了学习音乐。

en: She went to Paris to study music.
zh: 她去巴黎是为了学习音乐。

en: She likes to listen to music.
She began to derive further pleasure from listening to music.
zh: 她开始从听音乐中获得更多的乐趣。

en: She was listening to music.
She had a passionate interest in music.
zh: 她对音乐有着浓厚的兴趣。

en: She always studies listening to music.
She always studies while listening to music.
zh: 她总是边听音乐边学习。

en: She went to Italy for the purpose of studying music.
zh: 她去意大利是为了学习音乐。

en: She wants to go abroad so that she can study music.
zh: 她想出国，这样她就可以学习音乐了。

en: She went to Austria for the purpose of studying music.
zh: 她去奥地利是为了学习音乐。

en: She regretted not having gone into music.
Her musical talent was indifferent.
She has a genius for music.
She has a great faculty for music.
She's sitting as if charmed by the music.
zh: 她坐着，仿佛被音乐迷住了。

en: She has a great interest in music.
zh: 她对音乐有很大的兴趣。

en: She's very interested in music.
She finds an everlasting enjoyment in music.
zh: 她从音乐中找到了永恒的乐趣。

en: She has her heart in music.
She is interested in music.
She devoted her life to music.
zh: 她把一生都奉献给了音乐。

en: She excels her class in music.
zh: 她的音乐成绩在班里名列前茅。

en: She seemed to be very keen on music.
zh: 她似乎对音乐非常热衷。

en: She likes music very much.
She has a love of music.
She understands music.
She spoke in mild accents.
zh: 她说的话带着轻微的口音。

en: She is a quiet woman.
She resented being called a coward.
She boldly went up to the king.
zh: 她大胆地走到国王面前。

en: She would often practice the violin on the roof.
zh: 她经常在屋顶上练习小提琴。

en: She climbed down from the roof.
She dreamed that she was a princess.
She lives in Yokohama.
She has a clean heart.
She wanted to wash the dirty clothes.
She put the dirty dishes in the sink.
zh: 她把脏盘子放进水槽里。

en: She discovered that she had run out of salt.
She didn't have any pencils.
She drew a circle on a piece of paper with a pencil.
zh: 她用铅笔在纸上画了一个圆圈。

en: She didn't go far.
She caught sight of a rowing boat in the distance.
zh: 她瞥见远处有一艘划艇。

en: She heard a dog barking in the distance.
She stopped to smoke.
She stopped to smoke a cigarette.
She wore a blue dress made by her mother for the concert.
zh: 她穿着一件蓝色连衣裙，是她妈妈为她的音乐会做的。

en: She made references to World War II in her speech.
zh: 她在演讲中提到了第二次世界大战。

en: She is excellent at making speeches.
She has a genius for acting.
She was anxious for help.
She refused my offer to help her.
zh: 她拒绝了我帮助她的提议。

en: She is reading a manual on gardening.
zh: 她正在读一本关于园艺的手册。

en: She was reading a gardening manual.
zh: 她当时正在读一本园艺手册。

en: She hurried to the station only to miss the train.
zh: 她匆忙赶到车站，结果还是错过了火车。

en: She waited for her lover at the train station, but in vain.
zh: 她在火车站等她的爱人，但徒劳无功。

en: She takes a taxi from the station to her house.
She is a lady of business acumen.
zh: 她是一位有商业头脑的女士。

en: She went to America for the purpose of studying English literature.
zh: 她去美国是为了学习英国文学。

en: She is a British citizen but her native land is France.
zh: 她是英国公民，但她的祖国是法国。

en: She directed her efforts at learning to speak English.
She can't speak English, much less French.
zh: 她不会说英语，更不用说法语了。

en: She is good at speaking English.
She flatters herself that she is the best speaker of English.
zh: 她自认为她是英语说得最好的人。

en: Does she speak English?
She speaks English and also speaks Swahili.
zh: 她说英语，也会说斯瓦希里语。

en: She studies English every day.
She got into the university with a view to studying English.
zh: 她为了学习英语而进入了大学。

en: She studies English.
She speaks good English.
She speaks English very well.
She has great ability in teaching English.
zh: 她有很强的英语教学能力。

en: She gives instruction in English.
She teaches English.
She studied abroad in order to brush up her English.
zh: 她为了提高英语而出国留学。

en: She can speak English very well.
She can speak English very naturally.
She speaks English, and French as well.
She speaks both English and French.
She can speak French and German, not to speak of English.
zh: 她会说法德语，更不用说英语了。

en: She can speak French fluently, not to mention English.
zh: 她法语说得很流利，更不用说英语了。

en: She speaks Spanish, not to mention English.
zh: 她说西班牙语，更不用说英语了。

en: She speaks German and French, not to mention English.
zh: 她说德语和法语，更不用说英语了。

en: Not only does she speak English, but also German.
zh: 她不仅会说英语，还会说德语。

en: She can speak French, to say nothing of English.
zh: 她会说法语，更不用说英语了。

en: She is making progress with her English.
She is busy learning English.
She gets good marks in English.
She acquired the knowledge of English.
She is married to an English teacher, so she can take lessons free of charge.
zh: 她嫁给了一位英语老师，所以她可以免费上课。

en: She availed herself of every opportunity to improve her English.
zh: 她利用一切机会提高英语水平。

en: She took an examination in English.
zh: 她参加了一次英语考试。

en: She had an oral examination in English.
zh: 她参加了一次英语口语考试。

en: She has a rich vocabulary of English words.
zh: 她有丰富的英语词汇量。

en: She really showed her stuff in the English speech contest.
zh: 她在英语演讲比赛中大显身手。

en: She is excellent in English.
She takes a great interest in English.
She is quite at home in English.
She was at home in English.
She is fluent in English and French.
zh: 她的英语和法语都很流利。

en: She is capable of teaching both English and French.
zh: 她有能力教英语和法语。

en: She can speak both English and German.
She keeps her diary in English.
She can write a letter in English.
She got good marks in English.
She got good grades in English.
She got 80 marks for English.
She speaks not only English but also French.
zh: 她不仅会说英语，还会说法语。

en: In addition to English, she speaks French fluently.
zh: 除了英语，她还能流利地说法语。

en: She is not only fluent in English but speaks French fluently as well.
zh: 她不仅英语流利，法语也很流利。

en: She can speak not only English but also French.
zh: 她不仅会说英语，还会说法语。

en: She can speak Spanish as well as English.
zh: 她会说西班牙语和英语。

en: Not only can she speak French, she can also speak English.
zh: 她不仅会说法语，还会说英语。

en: She is at home in English.
She praised me, saying my English had improved by leaps and bounds.
zh: 她夸我，说我的英语进步神速。

en: She can't swim and neither can I.
She can't swim.
She swims well.
She went there to swim.
She doesn't know how to swim.
She boasts that she can swim well.
zh: 她吹嘘自己游泳游得很好。

en: She is a good swimmer.
She tried to swim.
She had no choice but to accept her fate.
zh: 她别无选择，只能接受命运。

en: She wants to get a driver's license.
She's too young to get a driver's license.
zh: 她太年轻了，不能考驾照。

en: She's not old enough to get a driver's license.
zh: 她还没到可以考驾照的年龄。

en: She resented his remarks about her poor driving.
zh: 她很讨厌他对她糟糕驾驶技术的评论。

en: She is a confirmed gossip.
zh: 她是个出了名的爱八卦的人。

en: She is very fond of gossip.
She tried to investigate the truth about the rumor.
zh: 她试图调查谣言的真相。

en: She scorns liars.
She accused me of telling a lie.
She is incapable of deceit.
She is often late for school on a rainy day.
zh: 下雨天她经常上学迟到。

en: She walked on and on in the rain.
She has known better days.
She is secretary to Mr Uda.
She is Mr. Uda's secretary.
She got burnt in the right hand.
She went to school in spite of the pain in her right leg.
zh: 尽管右腿疼痛，她还是去上学了。

en: She took no pleasure in eating or drinking.
zh: 她对吃喝没有任何兴趣。

en: She abandoned herself to drinking.
She put some money away every month for her retirement.
zh: 她每个月都存一些钱为退休做准备。

en: She announced her intention to retire.
zh: 她宣布了她退休的打算。

en: She screamed at the flash of lightning.
zh: 她被闪电吓得尖叫起来。

en: She suddenly became famous.
She saw at a glance that her daughter had been crying.
zh: 她一眼就看出她女儿哭过了。

en: She took to him immediately.
She was chosen from ten thousand applicants.
zh: 她是万里挑一选出来的。

en: She handed me a postcard.
She made her way to the goal step by step.
zh: 她一步一个脚印地走向目标。

en: She lay awake all night.
She picked out the most expensive dress.
She read the book all night.
She kept crying all night long.
She kept crying all night.
She wept the entire night.
She cried all night.
She cried throughout the night.
She is a good teacher, as teachers go.
zh: 就老师而言，她是个好老师。

en: She kept silent all day.
She remained silent all day.
The girl did nothing but read all day.
zh: 那个女孩一整天什么也不做，只读书。

en: She indulges in tennis all the day.
She goes to the library every other day.
zh: 她每隔一天去一次图书馆。

en: She goes to the dentist every other day.
zh: 她每隔一天去看一次牙医。

en: She had never mingled in the society of women.
zh: 她从未涉足过女性社交圈。

en: She has never been asked for a date.
zh: 从来没有人约她出去过。

en: She has never been asked out on a date.
zh: 从来没有人约她出去过。

en: She has visited New York once.
How did she ever pass the test?
zh: 她到底是怎么通过考试的？

en: I don't know what's got into her.
She remained unmarried until death.
She passed the examination by working hard.
zh: 她努力学习，通过了考试。

en: She had to study hard to catch up with her classmates.
zh: 她必须努力学习才能赶上她的同学。

en: She must have studied very hard.
She has to study hard and catch up with everybody in her class.
zh: 她必须努力学习，赶上班里的所有人。

en: She worked hard, only to fail the examination.
zh: 她努力学习，结果却考试失败了。

en: She is hard at work.
She attained her success through hard work.
zh: 她通过努力工作获得了成功。

en: She worked hard.
She was hard at work writing letters.
She tried hard, but she failed.
Although she studied hard, she did not succeed in the examination.
zh: 虽然她努力学习了，但她没有通过考试。

en: She made up for lost time by working hard.
zh: 她通过努力工作来弥补失去的时间。

en: She ran as fast as she could.
She explained about this goods hard.
zh: 她努力地解释了关于这个商品的事情。

en: She spent her life in pursuit of the truth.
She devoted her life to education.
zh: 她一生都献给了教育事业。

en: She brought up nine children in her life.
zh: 她一生养育了九个孩子。

en: She hid the secret from her husband all her life.
zh: 她一生都对她的丈夫隐瞒了这个秘密。

en: She was afraid to travel alone.
She is used to living alone.
She mourned over the death of her only son.
zh: 她为她唯一的儿子的去世而悲伤。

en: She decided to go shopping by herself.
She likes to go walking by herself.
She brought up the three children alone.
zh: 她独自抚养了三个孩子。

en: She is not old enough to travel abroad by herself.
zh: 她年纪太小，不能独自出国旅行。

en: She went to Mexico by herself.
zh: 她自己一个人去了墨西哥。

en: She is incapable of doing anything alone.
zh: 她什么事都不能自己做。

en: She carried that table by herself.
zh: 她自己一个人搬了那张桌子。

en: She lives in this house by herself.
zh: 她自己一个人住在这栋房子里。

en: She came alone.
She lives in an apartment alone.
She likes to be on her own.
Though she was alone, I didn't think she was lonely.
zh: 虽然她独自一人，但我并不觉得她孤独。

en: She was rapt in prayer.
She will get well in a week.
zh: 她一个星期后就会康复。

en: She was made to wait for over an hour.
zh: 她被迫等了一个多小时。

en: She has a faculty for doing two things at once.
zh: 她有同时做两件事的能力。

en: She couldn't utter a word.
She went out without saying a word.
zh: 她一句话也没说就出去了。

en: She left the room without saying a word.
zh: 她一句话也没说就离开了房间。

en: She is, in a word, a dreamer.
zh: 总而言之，她是个梦想家。

en: She is apparently an honest woman.
zh: 她显然是个诚实的女人。

en: There's more to her than you think. She may seem pretty meek on first glance, but I get the sense she can get things done when she needs to.
zh: 她比你想象的更有内涵。乍一看她可能显得很温顺，但我感觉她需要做事的时候就能把事情做好。

en: She supports her family.
She has worn the same hat for a month.
zh: 她戴同一顶帽子戴了一个月了。

en: She looked after my dog for a month.
zh: 她帮我照顾了我的狗一个月。

en: She is well brought up.
She had an appointment with the doctor.
She decided to be a doctor.
She will become a doctor.
She was trained as a doctor.
She became a doctor.
She is not a doctor, but a teacher.
zh: 她不是医生，而是一名老师。

en: Isn't she a doctor?
Is she a doctor?
She is a doctor and also an alpinist.
zh: 她是一名医生，也是一名登山运动员。

en: She was a medical student.
She went to Germany to study medicine.
She went to America with a view to studying medicine.
She makes careful choices when she buys clothes.
zh: 她买衣服时会仔细挑选。

en: She is going to have another blouse made to go with her costume.
zh: 她打算再做一件衬衫来搭配她的服装。

en: She died of stomach cancer.
She feels very shy in the presence of the opposite sex.
zh: 她在异性面前感到非常害羞。

en: She flung her coat on the chair and stormed into the room.
zh: 她把外套扔在椅子上，怒气冲冲地走进房间。

en: Sitting on the chair, she listened to me.
zh: 她坐在椅子上，听我说话。

en: She sat in a chair reading a magazine.
She was sitting in a chair, and she was watching TV.
She was sitting in a chair, watching TV.
She's a big teaser.
She is an obstinate girl.
She was taken to hospital unconscious.
zh: 她被送往医院时已经失去了知觉。

en: She recovered her senses.
Brought up by a weak mother, she is partial to sweets.
zh: 她在软弱的母亲的抚养下长大，所以喜欢甜食。

en: With dignity she protested her innocence.
zh: 她庄严地申辩自己是无辜的。

en: He is known as a great poet.
She became a great artist.
zh: 她成为了一位伟大的艺术家。

en: She became a famous painter.
zh: 她成为了一位著名的画家。

en: She proved to be a great musician.
zh: 她证明是一位伟大的音乐家。

en: She was believed to have been a film star before.
zh: 人们认为她以前是一位电影明星。

en: She writes much better now than she used to.
zh: 她现在比以前写得好多了。

en: She was in the habit of sitting up late at night.
She is not the cheerful woman she was before.
zh: 她不再是以前那个开朗的女人了。

en: She has never seen it before.
She was been here before, and so have I.
zh: 她以前来过这里，我也是。

en: She made the same mistake as before.
zh: 她犯了和以前一样的错误。

en: She managed to run away under cover of darkness.
zh: 她设法在黑暗的掩护下逃走了。

en: She's afraid of the dark.
She disappeared in the dark.
She could not get over her fear of the dark.
zh: 她无法克服对黑暗的恐惧。

en: She is very afraid of the dark.
She has a terror of darkness.
She came home after dark.
She groped for the light switch in the dark.
zh: 她在黑暗中摸索着电灯开关。

en: She doesn't wear the cheap stuff.
She gave out a sigh of relief.
zh: 她如释重负地叹了口气。

en: She had an easy delivery.
She is always complaining of her small salary.
zh: 她总是抱怨她微薄的薪水。

en: She lives in comfort.
She installed herself in an easy chair.
zh: 她让自己舒服地坐在安乐椅上。

en: She works hard in the office for a small salary.
zh: 她在办公室努力工作，但薪水很低。

en: Despite her meagre salary, she works very hard.
zh: 尽管她薪水微薄，但她工作非常努力。

en: Even though her salary is low, she works hard for that company.
zh: 即使她的工资很低，她也为那家公司努力工作。

en: She gave me her hand to shake.
She seems to be possessed by an evil spirit.
She is possessed by a devil.
She didn't do it out of malice.
zh: 她不是出于恶意才那样做的。

en: She is mixing with the wrong crowd.
zh: 她和不三不四的人混在一起。

en: She was sorry to hear the bad news.
zh: 听到这个坏消息她很难过。

en: She had a bad tooth taken out.
She left without even saying good-bye to her friends.
zh: 她甚至没有和朋友们说再见就离开了。

en: She is curt.
She is hungry for affection.
She is dead to love.
She has a charming face.
She was greedy for love.
She was radiant with love.
She felt something between love and hatred.
zh: 她感到一种介于爱和恨之间的情感。

en: She lives in an apartment above us.
zh: 她住在我们楼上的公寓里。

en: She seems to understand what I say.
zh: 她好像能听懂我说的话。

en: She is always curious about what I am doing.
zh: 她总是对我在做什么感到好奇。

en: She was very delighted with my gift.
zh: 她对我的礼物非常高兴。

en: She did well by me.
She sat side by side with me.
She lives on a small pension.
zh: 她靠微薄的养老金生活。

en: She wrote the book with very little effort.
zh: 她毫不费力地写了这本书。

en: She tried hard in vain to make both ends meet on a small salary.
zh: 她努力工作，但徒劳无功，靠微薄的薪水维持生计。

en: She went out of her way to do such a foolish thing.
zh: 她特意去做这么愚蠢的事情。

en: She deliberately ignored me on the street.
She cried for effect.
zh: 她为了引起注意而哭泣。

en: She purposely showed off her dress.
She felt a pain in her side.
She had to smile at her misfortune.
zh: 她只能苦笑面对自己的不幸。

en: She prefers beer to wine.
zh: 她喜欢啤酒胜过葡萄酒。

en: She took full advantage of her stay in London to improve her English.
zh: 她充分利用在伦敦的逗留时间来提高她的英语水平。

en: She would often go to the theater when she was in London.
zh: 她在伦敦的时候经常去看戏。

en: She went from London to Paris.
She went either to London or to Paris.
She is our next best pianist after Mr Long.
zh: 她是继龙先生之后我们第二好的钢琴家。

en: She was wearing long boots.
Now Marina was a romantic, she had not yet fallen into that passive state of mind which accepts that one should find a corner to live, anywhere, and then arrange one's whole life around it.
zh: 玛丽娜当时是个浪漫的人，她还没有陷入那种消极的心态，即接受应该找个角落住下来，随便哪里都行，然后围绕它安排自己的整个生活。

en: She is absorbed in rock music.
She can speak Russian.
When she was in Los Angeles, she had at least six different jobs.
zh: 她在洛杉矶的时候，至少做过六份不同的工作。

en: She answered with hardly a smile.
zh: 她几乎没有笑容地回答。

en: She had only eaten a little before she left the table.
zh: 她在离开餐桌前只吃了一点点。

en: She paid a visit to Laurie's house.
She climbed a rope hand over hand.
She took a strong hold on the rope.
She played cards with Roy.
Was she able to write a report?
She made many mistakes in typing the report.
zh: 她在打报告时犯了很多错误。

en: She is a very correct lady.
zh: 她是一位非常严谨的女士。

en: She went out of the restaurant.
She gave me access to her records.
zh: 她允许我查阅她的记录。

en: She was as thin as a rail.
She cut the apple in half.
She watched the apple trees burst into blossom.
zh: 她看着苹果树开满了花。

en: She had a basket full of apples.
zh: 她有一个装满苹果的篮子。

en: She started early in order to avoid the rush hour.
zh: 她为了避开高峰期，很早就出发了。

en: She practices English conversation by listening to the radio.

en: She turned off the radio.
She had a radio.
She turned down the radio.
zh: 她把收音机音量调小了。

en: She rode a camel.
She relies on the lion.
She isn't used to sitting up late at night.
She goes under the name of Yotchan.
She is often absent without leave.
She would often play the piano after school.
She bore her sorrow well.
She is often mistaken for her sister.
zh: 她经常被误认为是她的妹妹。

en: She is charming as well as diligent.
She works hard.
She was frequently late for school.
She was often late for school.
She would cite from the Bible.
She would often come late for school.
She pretended to be hard of hearing.
She would often play tricks on me.
She will often listen to records for hours.
zh: 她经常听唱片听好几个小时。

en: She cannot be relied on because she often tells lies.
zh: 她不可靠，因为她经常说谎。

en: She talks a lot.
She's a frequent visitor to this country.
She made a tour around Europe.
She came with good news.
She rushed home with the good news.
She is blessed with good sons.
zh: 她很有福气，有孝顺的儿子。

en: She will make a good wife.
She wore a loose jacket.
zh: 她穿着一件宽松的夹克。

en: She closed her diary slowly.
She slowly moved forward.
She turned the doorknob slowly.
She has a sense of humor.
She was caught in a shower and got wet to the skin.
zh: 她被阵雨淋湿了，浑身湿透。

en: As often as she tried, she failed.
zh: 她尝试了很多次，但都失败了。

en: She failed every time she tried.
She was obliged to give up the plan.
zh: 她不得不放弃这个计划。

en: She reluctantly went by herself.
She managed to get by the crowd in the park.
zh: 她设法穿过了公园里的人群。

en: She finally reached the hotel.
She is likely to come.
She was profuse in praises.
She buys shoes indiscriminately.
She has tried various methods of slimming down.
zh: 她尝试过各种减肥方法。

en: She went on a reducing diet.
She is on a diet to lose weight.
She will make a fond mother.
She is not only gentle but brave.
She is gentle.
She left the kitchen with the kettle boiling.
zh: 她离开厨房时，水壶还在烧着。

en: She was kept under with morphine injections.
zh: 她靠注射吗啡来维持镇静。

en: She is no longer what she used to be.
zh: 她已经不是以前的她了。

en: She could not put up with the insults any more.
zh: 她再也无法忍受这些侮辱了。

en: She had a thoughtful look on her face.
zh: 她脸上带着沉思的表情。

en: She has a gigantic appetite.
She's hyperactive.
She is herself again.
She was formerly a bank clerk.
She is making an effort at becoming a model.
zh: 她正在努力成为一名模特。

en: She is said to have been a model.
She's practicing English so she can get a better job.
zh: 她正在练习英语，以便找到更好的工作。

en: She is old enough to know better.
zh: 她都这么大了，应该懂事了。

en: She needs to be more careful.
She should have been more careful.
She should listen more to other people.
zh: 她应该多听听别人的意见。

en: She asked the office, in order to obtain more detailed information.
zh: 为了获得更详细的信息，她询问了办公室。

en: She is looking for a large apartment.

en: She wished for a more relaxing life, but that was impossible under the circumstances.
zh: 她希望过上更轻松的生活，但在当时的情况下这是不可能的。

en: She wanted to live a more relaxing life.
She can naturally speak English.
zh: 她能说一口流利的英语。

en: Of course she can speak English.
She can speak English, of course.
She is already back.
She's old enough to know the truth.
zh: 她已经懂事到可以知道真相了。

en: She told me once and for all that she did not want to see me again.
zh: 她彻底地告诉我，她不想再见到我了。

en: She is now well enough to work.
zh: 她现在身体好到可以工作了。

en: She was almost late for school.
She came near being run over.
She came close to falling off the platform.
zh: 她差点从站台上掉下去。

en: She was close to breaking into tears.
She came near being drowned.
She's no spring chicken. She's at least thirty.
zh: 她可不是年轻姑娘了。她至少三十岁了。

en: She isn't young anymore. She's at least 30 years old.
zh: 她不再年轻了。她至少30岁了。

en: Has she finished her work yet?
She has already finished the work.
Now that she has quit her job, we can't depend on her.
zh: 既然她已经辞职了，我们就不能依赖她了。

en: She is already married.
She is out of danger.
She was now out of danger.
She has already left the office.
She ought to be at the office by now.
zh: 她现在应该到办公室了。

en: She felt like going to Tohoku again.
She tried to jump up a second time.
She'll try it once more.
It's all over with her.
Has she finished the book yet?
She doesn't live there any more.
It's in the cards for her to buy a car soon.
They say that she'll get married soon.
zh: 据说她很快就要结婚了。

en: She will be able to swim soon.
She is close on sixty.
She is close to sixty.
Is she here yet?
She is no longer what she was five years ago.
zh: 她已经不是五年前的她了。

en: She is having second thoughts about buying another car.
zh: 她对再买一辆车犹豫不决。

en: She has been studying French for ten years, so she ought to realize what French is.
zh: 她学了十年法语，所以她应该明白法语是什么。

en: She was baptized Mary.
She seldom gives way to tears.
She is rarely late for appointments.
She seldom eats breakfast.
She is seldom late for school.
She seldom goes out.
She seldom goes to that sort of place.
She seldom goes to places like that.
She put off going to Mexico.
zh: 她推迟了去墨西哥的行程。

en: She took off her glasses and put her contacts in.
zh: 她摘下眼镜，戴上了隐形眼镜。

en: She is applying the glasses.
She wore glasses.
She's cleaning off the make-up.
She gave the children two apples each.
zh: 她给每个孩子分了两个苹果。

en: She asked Mary to find her little boy.
zh: 她让玛丽帮她找她的小儿子。

en: She had a sullen look on her face.
zh: 她脸上带着闷闷不乐的表情。

en: She drives everybody up the wall.
zh: 她让每个人都心烦意乱。

en: She will have to cook for everyone.
zh: 她将不得不为所有人做饭。

en: She walked fast so as to catch up with the others.
zh: 她走得很快，以便赶上其他人。

en: She is known to everyone.
She asked the same question of everyone in turn.
zh: 她依次问了每个人同样的问题。

en: She is dearly loved by everybody.
She poured the milk into a bowl.
She drank a cup of milk.
She lives on milk and vegetables.
She does Mickey Mouse very well.
zh: 她模仿米老鼠模仿得很像。

en: She is a pretty girl to look at.
zh: 她是个漂亮女孩，很耐看。

en: She saw the shabby little house, but she didn't hurry by.
zh: 她看到了那间破旧的小房子，但她没有匆匆走过。

en: She is a woman of singular beauty.
zh: 她是一位拥有独特美貌的女性。

en: She looked as though she had seen a ghost.
zh: 她看起来好像见了鬼一样。

en: She speaks English as if she were a native speaker.
zh: 她说英语说得好像是母语者一样。

en: She looks pale as if she were ill.
zh: 她脸色苍白，好像生病了一样。

en: She looked as if she had been ill.
zh: 她看起来好像生过病一样。

en: She looked as if she had been sick for a long time.
zh: 她看起来好像病了很久。

en: She speaks as if she were a teacher.
zh: 她说话的样子好像一位老师。

en: She looks as beautiful as if she were an actress.
zh: 她看起来非常漂亮，好像一位女演员。

en: She talked as if she were my mother.
zh: 她说话的样子好像我妈妈。

en: She talks about Paris as if she had been there many times.
zh: 她谈论巴黎，好像去过很多次一样。

en: She talks as if she knew everything.
zh: 她说话的样子好像什么都知道。

en: She looks as noble as if she were a princess.
zh: 她看起来非常高贵，好像一位公主。

en: She speaks as if she had really been in France.
zh: 她说起话来，好像真的去过法国一样。

en: She talks as if she knew everything about it.
zh: 她说起话来，好像对它的一切都了如指掌。

en: She talks as if he knew everything under the sun.
zh: 她说起话来，好像他什么都知道。

en: The job filled every minute of her day.
zh: 这份工作占据了她一天中的每一分钟。

en: It will not be long before she comes back.
She will come back before long.
She will be here before long.
It won't be long before she gets over her illness.
zh: 她很快就会从疾病中恢复过来。

en: She soon came to believe him.
She will leave the hospital soon.
Before long, she came into my room.
zh: 不久之后，她走进了我的房间。

en: She will come here before long.
She will come to this place soon.
zh: 她很快就会来这个地方。

en: She blinked to stop the tears.
She is all nervous.
She told me that the most incredible thing had just happened.
zh: 她告诉我刚刚发生了一件最不可思议的事情。

en: She did it all by herself.
She found herself much alone.
She hasn't got the knack of cooking yet.
zh: 她还没掌握烹饪的诀窍。

en: She still depends on her parents.
She hasn't come yet. She may have taken a wrong bus.
zh: 她还没来。她可能坐错车了。

en: She hasn't come yet.
She is still under age.
She's still a minor.
She's still under age.
She hasn't cleaned her room yet.
She doesn't dare leave the room for fear she should catch cold.
zh: 她不敢离开房间，怕感冒。

en: She has not yet had her name entered in her husband's family.
zh: 她还没把名字记在她丈夫的户口上。

en: She still loved him.
She has not yet accepted his proposal.
She believes her son is still alive.
zh: 她相信她的儿子还活着。

en: She's still dependent on her parents.
She is still financially dependent on her parents.
zh: 她在经济上仍然依赖她的父母。

en: She is yet to know the truth.
She doesn't know the truth yet.
She doesn't yet know the truth.
She has not finished her homework yet.
She may not have finished her homework.
zh: 她可能还没完成她的作业。

en: She made a great discovery while yet a young student.

en: She can't ride a bicycle yet.

She has not spoken to me yet.
She's but a child.
She hasn't turned up yet.

zh: 她又改变主意了，这让我们都很生气。

en: She will write another book one of these days.
zh: 总有一天她会再写一本书的。

en: She is not up yet.
She is her old self again.
zh: 她又恢复了原来的样子。

en: She is a mere child, you know.
zh: 她不过是个孩子，你知道的。

en: She has broken the toaster again.
zh: 她又把烤面包机弄坏了。

en: She's not yet heard the news.
zh: 她还没听到这个消息呢。

en: She hasn't heard the news yet.

en: She will be coming to see us again soon.
zh: 她很快会再来看我们的。

en: She is not here yet.

en: She hasn't come here yet. I am afraid she may have lost her way.

en: She is chattering yet.

en: She seldom, if ever, goes to bed before eleven.

en: She has become more and more beautiful.
She seems to get fatter and fatter.
She seem to be getting fatter.

en: She seems to have seen the very accident.

en: She's honest enough, but can you really trust her?

en: She has an absent look on her face.

en: She was idly looking out of the window.

en: She was idly turning over the pages of a magazine.

en: She is nothing but a child.

She had only a small fortune.
She prepared the meal in a very short time.

en: She takes pleasure in seeing horror films.

en: She smiled and accepted my little present.

en: She asked Bob to teach her how to ski.

en: She hardly ate anything.

She didn't have much money.
It was not long before she came.
She will be back before long.

en: She has asked the man at the hotel desk to get her the number.

en: She had the hotel suite to herself.

en: Is she staying at a hotel?

She stayed at a hotel.
She has a slender figure.

en: She traveled from Boston to San Francisco via Chicago.

en: She brushed away the dust.

en: She is more beautiful than any other girl.

zh: 她抱怨她男朋友的恶作剧。

en: She put down her pen.

She sat on the bench.
